verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus sinners doth receive; Well may we this saying ponder Who in sin's delusions live, And from God and Heaven wander: Here is hope for all who grieve\Jesus sinners doth receive.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: We deserve but grief and shame,\Yet His words, rich grace revealing, Pardon, peace, and life proclaim; Here their ills have perfect healing Who with humble hearts believe\Jesus sinners doth receive.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: As the shepherd seeks to find His lost sheep that from Him strayeth, So hath Christ each soul in mind, And for its salvation prayeth; Fain He'd have each wand'rer live: Jesus sinners doth receive.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Come, then, all by guilt oppressed, Jesus calls, and He would make you God's own children, pure and blest, And to glory He would take you; Think on this, and well believe Jesus sinners doth receive.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Savior, now I come to Thee: Great my sins, a weary burden! Wilt Thou mercy show to me? Can I hope to find a pardon? I will trust: my soul relieve! Me, a sinner, Lord, receive!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Rich Thy mercy\- strangely good! O how oft have I offended!
But through Thy redeeming blood All my fear of wrath is ended:
Yes I now can witness give: Jesus sinners doth receive!

verse.name: v7
v8
verse.lines:
Jesus sinners doth receive! Happy in His ceaseless favor,
Here for Heaven I will live, There shall live with Him forever,
"Joy in death these tidings give; Jesus sinners doth receive!"
